The claim made by State Rep: Greg Steube that no children in the history of the United States have died in a fire at school.
The data on school fires provided by the: which lists school fires with 10 or more deaths.
Specific examples of fatal school fires: such as the Consolidated School in New London, Texas, the Lakeview School in Collinwood, Ohio, and Our Lady of the Angels school in Chicago.
